name: VYSOKÁ ŠKOLA BÁŇSKÁ - TECHNICKÁ UNIVERZITA OSTRAVA
goal: The University's Institutional Plan for years 2019-2020 is based on the "Long-Term Plan for Educational, Scientific, Research, Development and Innovation, Art, and other creative activities for Higher Education Areas 2019-2020" The Institutional Plan 2019-2020 specifies areas, objectives and activities that the university undertakes to meet in years 2019-2020 through institutional projects and other projects and programs. University sets out the indicators which serve to assess the overall long-term development of the university in those areas that VSB-TUO considers to be important in its long-term development. VSB-TUO has set the following areas of development in the Institutional Plan 2019-2020: Quality assurance; Diversity and availability; Internationalization; Relevance; Quality, relevant research; Development and Innovation; Decision-making based on data; Efficient funding; Renewal and development of infrastructure; Promotion, popularization and marketing; Technology transfer and business.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Energy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
- GROW - DG Internal Market, Industry, Entrepreneurship and SMEs
- Strategic projects of EU in Automotive
- Electromobility and batteries policy and legislations
